alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake; Lorain; Medina (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 6:32AM EST until January 14 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM FRIDAY TO 1 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Snow amounts of 2 to 6 expected, with up to 9 inches in lake effect regions. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Ohio and northwest Pennsylvania. * WHEN...From 1 AM Friday to 1 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
